Place of Birth: Vill. Juvvalapalem, Distt. West Godavari (Andhra P
Social And Cultural Activities: Social service, especially involved in medical care for the rural poor
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Serve people and enjoy interacting with people
Special Interests: Nature loving, taming and caretaking of pets, birds, floriculture and vegetable gardens.
Educational Qualifications: Higher Secondary Educated at Hyderabad Public School, Andhra Pradesh
Other Information: Father was political leader. Father-in-law was MLA in 1964 and was positioned as Chairman, TTD Board, Tirumala for two terms. Uncle, Siris Raju was well known industrialist and was Dy. Chairman of A.P Legislative Assembly
